basics.name: Nicolas Moreau
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Junior Full Stack Developer, certified video geek and creative thinker. I am extremely passionate about new multimedia technologies and, despite my love for the outdoors, saying I enjoy on-screen problem solving and the documentation harvesting it usually implies, would be an understatement. I think the human factor of a product starts with the mulidisciplinary factor of a team. Aspects of a product like UEx fluidity and rationality or UI consistency are things I not only notice but also practice. More so, when I am done working on the configuration of an API or the security of my server. I look forward to joining a team of people that require my skill set in both Mutlimedia and web Technologies. Above all, I am looking for a team that, like me, strives for a perfect balance between efficiency and quality when it comes to digital content design.

work.summary: Content management and Distribution: Technicolor harnesses our 100-year expertise, robust infrastructure and technological agility, to support all of your content management and distribution requirements in this ever-changing landscape. Our comprehensive offering enables the efficient management and distribution of your dynamic content to the cinema, home and on-the-go.
highlights: Creation of XSLT schema for CSV to XML transformation
Designated moderator of the iTunes content delivery think tank

volunteer.summary: This timely documentary from filmmaker Alexandre Trudeau shows how the logic of empire is being tested by competing global interests in a rapidly changing Middle East
